channel.title: Firsts on Year Zero
channel.description: Recent content in Firsts on Year Zero

item.title: Firsts
item.description: New Firsts Part of my ethic for Year Zero is to do new things. These are some of the new things that I’ve done and new things I’ve achieved. 15 February - Seminar at Harvard University 10 April - Review paper published (on Robotic Telescopes in Education) 7 April - Appeared on Radio 1 Newsbeat talking about exoplanets 5 May - Hiked to the top of Snowdon 27 May - Saw Alien in the undercroft of Cardiff Castle 1 June - Travelled in the HeathrowPod to Terminal 5 23 June - Visit to Disneyland, Anaheim, California 5 July - Trip to Norway and drank brandy from a hip-flask at the foot of a glacier 8 September - Was under curfew because of a hurricane, Hurricane Irma, Orlando, Florida 4 October - Visited Finland for a conference of 100 innovators in education, HundrED, Helsinki Old Firsts There are plenty of things that I enjoy doing, which are significant.
